headline: Jim Cramer Recommends These 4 AI Stocks These Days, Says 'Wise Speculation' Can Change Your Life
summary: CNBC host Jim Cramer has been urging young investors to put their money in individual stocks instead of limiting themselves to index funds if they want to earn substantial profits. He said in a recent program that he is not against "wise" speculation in stock picking, as it can deliver investors outsized gains. "Speculation itself is not bad," Cramer said. headline: Elon Musk's $1 trillion pay fight — and other things to expect at Thursday's Tesla shareholder meeting
summary:
Musk’s pay package will be the main highlight on Thursday when Tesla holds its 2025 annual shareholder meeting, where investors will vote on a slew of proposals, including the status of directors and Tesla investments.
Here are the top three things to watch.

content.title: Elon Musk's $1 trillion pay fight — and other things to expect at Thursday's Tesla shareholder meeting

Musk’s pay package will be the main highlight on Thursday when Tesla holds its 2025 annual shareholder meeting, where investors will vote on a slew of proposals, including the status of directors and Tesla investments.
Here are the top three things to watch.

headline: Tesla board to shareholders: Pay Musk or else
summary: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) -Tesla's board of directors has pushed in all its chips on Elon Musk.  Shareholders will vote Thursday on the stark choice presented by the board: pay Musk up to $878 billion in company stock or take the risk he will leave – potentially driving down the company’s stock.  The board and many investors argue that only Musk can deliver on his promises to transform Tesla into an artificial-intelligence juggernaut delivering millions of self-driving robotaxis and humanoid robots.

content.title: Tesla board to shareholders: Pay Musk or else
content.summary: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) -Tesla's board of directors has pushed in all its chips on Elon Musk.  Shareholders will vote Thursday on the stark choice presented by the board: pay Musk up to $878 billion in company stock or take the risk he will leave – potentially driving down the company’s stock.  The board and many investors argue that only Musk can deliver on his promises to transform Tesla into an artificial-intelligence juggernaut delivering millions of self-driving robotaxis and humanoid robots.

headline: World shares retreat after losses for Big Tech pull US stocks lower
summary: Shares in Europe and Asia retreated Wednesday following a decline on Wall Street spurred by selling of Big Tech shares.  The spillover from Wall Street was evident.  Shares in energy and tech giant SoftBank Group sank 10% on jitters over its investments in artificial intelligence.

content.title: World shares retreat after losses for Big Tech pull US stocks lower
content.summary: Shares in Europe and Asia retreated Wednesday following a decline on Wall Street spurred by selling of Big Tech shares.  The spillover from Wall Street was evident.  Shares in energy and tech giant SoftBank Group sank 10% on jitters over its investments in artificial intelligence.
